thread.title: Khloe Kardashian rushes to bedside of ex-husband Lamar Odom, who is fighting for his life
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian rushes to bedside of ex-husband Lamar Odom, who is fighting for his life

title: Khloe Kardashian rushes to bedside of ex-husband Lamar Odom, who is fighting for his life
text:
Khloe Kardashian rushes to bedside of ex-husband Lamar Odom, who is fighting for his life Khloe Kardashian rushes to bedside of ex-husband Lamar Odom, who is fighting for his life 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
An “inconsolable” Khloe Kardashian is by the side of ex-husband Lamar Odom, who is fighting for his life after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel. 
The 31-year-old flew to his bedside in Las Vegas, accompanied by her sister Kim and mother Kris Jenner. 
Nye County Sheriff’s Department were called to the Love Ranch in Vegas, a legal brothel owned by Dennis Hof, following a report of an unresponsive man needing an ambulance. Khloe and Kim Kardashian (Evan Agostini/Invision) 
Lamar was stabilised and taken to Desert View Hospital, the statement said. 
Officials then tried to have the 35-year-old airlifted, but the 6ft 8in former NBA star was too tall for the helicopter and he was driven by ambulance to Sunrise Hospital and Medical Centre. 
Press and paparazzi are outside Sunrise, but there is no further word on Lamar’s condition. 
The emergency call came from Richard Hunter, media director for Dennis Hof, the sheriff’s statement said. Lamar Odom as a Los Angeles Clippers player (Mark J Terrill/AP) 
Lamar last played in the NBA in 2013. Reality TV fame came via his four-year marriage to Khloe. She filed for divorce in 2013, citing irreconcilable differences. 
Following a whirlwind engagement filmed for the E! network, which airs Keeping Up With The Kardashians, the couple were married in 2009 in a large ceremony that was also filmed by E!. 
Troubles Lamar faced before and during his basketball career appeared to worsen after he left the league, and included a no-contest plea to drink-driving shortly before his divorce. Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian (Dan Steinberg/AP) 
He won two NBA championships with the Los Angeles Lakers in 2009 and 2010, and most recently played for the Los Angeles Clippers during the 2012-13 season. In February last year, Lamar signed with a Spanish team on a two-month deal, but a month later he returned to the US because of a back injury. 
The former sports star has a daughter Destiny and a son Lamar Jr, from a previous relationship. In 2006, six-month-old son Jayden died from sudden infant death syndrome while sleeping in his cot in New York. Share article 
Mr Hof, who had his own reality series called Cathouse on HBO, said Lamar had been staying at his home attached to the brothel since October 10. He said the star “wanted to get away from everybody, wanted to have fun”. Promoted Stories
